text: Because is a 1918 British silent drama film directed by Sidney Morgan and starring Lilian Braithwaite, Ben Webster and George Foley.Low p.100 A father locks his daughter up when she refuses to marry the man he has chosen as her husband. ==Cast== * Lilian Braithwaite * Ben Webster * George Foley * Joyce Carey * Joan Morgan * J.
